verse: At that time the disciples came to Jesus and said, “Who is greatest in the kingdom of heaven?”
Then He called a child to Him and had him stand among them.

header: The Parable of the Lost Sheep
The Parable of the Unforgiving Slave

verse: Then Peter came to Him and said, “Lord, how many times could my brother sin against me and I forgive him? As many as seven times?”
